function(add_kmlengine_test name)
    add_libkml_test(${name} kmlengine)
endfunction()

add_kmlengine_test(bbox_test)
add_kmlengine_test(clone_test)
add_kmlengine_test(entity_mapper_test)
add_kmlengine_test(feature_balloon_test)
add_kmlengine_test(feature_view_test)
add_kmlengine_test(feature_visitor_test)
add_kmlengine_test(find_test)
add_kmlengine_test(find_xml_namespaces_test)
add_kmlengine_test(get_link_parents_test)
add_kmlengine_test(get_links_test)
add_kmlengine_test(href_test)
add_kmlengine_test(id_mapper_test)
add_kmlengine_test(kml_cache_test)
add_kmlengine_test(kml_file_test)
add_kmlengine_test(kml_stream_test)
add_kmlengine_test(kml_uri_test)
add_kmlengine_test(kmz_cache_test)
add_kmlengine_test(kmz_file_test)
add_kmlengine_test(link_util_test)
add_kmlengine_test(location_util_test)
add_kmlengine_test(merge_test)
add_kmlengine_test(object_id_parser_observer_test)
add_kmlengine_test(old_schema_parser_observer_test)
add_kmlengine_test(parse_old_schema_test)
add_kmlengine_test(schema_parser_observer_test)
add_kmlengine_test(shared_style_parser_observer_test)
add_kmlengine_test(style_inliner_test)
add_kmlengine_test(style_merger_test)
add_kmlengine_test(style_resolver_test)
add_kmlengine_test(style_splitter_test)
add_kmlengine_test(update_processor_test)
add_kmlengine_test(update_test)
